title: The Food World According to Mimi Sheraton
itunes:title: The Food World According to Mimi Sheraton
itunes:subtitle: Mimi Sheraton, the first woman restaurant critic at The New York Times, doesn't trust anonymous crowd-sourced reviews and says that authentic food is in the eye of the eater. Also on this week's show: The near death of Tex-Mex; how to make a ...
description:
Mimi Sheraton, the first woman restaurant critic at The New York Times, doesn’t trust anonymous crowd-sourced reviews and says that authentic food is in the eye of the eater. Also on this week’s show: The near death of Tex-Mex; how to make a simple Tuscan beef and pepper stew; a new theory of wine; and a recipe for a Moroccan Nutella.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
